author: Jcchain
text: Bitweb main line and start mining.

author: Jcchain
text: Adding bitweb coins to mining pool.

author: Jcchain
text: Official forum officially released and discord group established.

author: Mraksoll
text: Upgrade wallet to v0.21.1.0 .

author: Jcchain
text: New official website.

author: Mraksoll
text: New Explorer development completed.

author: Mraksoll
text: Upgrade wallet to v0.21.1.1 .

author: Jcchain
text: Post bitcoin talk

author: Mraksoll
text: Paper wallet development completed.

author: Mraksoll
text: The development of electrumx is completed.

author: Jcchain
text: Official website updated again.

author: Mraksoll
text: Electrum-bte development completed.

author: Mraksoll and Jcchain
text: Electrum Bitweb Wallet v4.1.2(Windows,macOS,Linux,Android v7.0 and higher,Python v3.6.1 and higher) and Official website updated again.

author: Jcchain
text: Welcome Quokasoft company join the Bitweb project development team.

author: Mraksoll
text: The wallet version was upgraded again to v0.21.1.2. Add new seeds , fix some typo , update gitrepo links , fix bip34, return fallbackfee.

author: Mraksoll and Jcchain
text: Discord tip-bot development completed,Can directly generate addresses, check balances, and send transactions. The official website is updated again.

author: Mraksoll
text: The development of webwallet and API server is completed. Webwallet logs in by email. It can view the balance, send BTE, receive BTE, and support multiple languages.

author: Jcchain
text: The official website was updated, new icons were added, partners were added, and French translation was added.

author: Jcchain
text: The official website is updated again, add ecology page.

author: Jcchain
text: The official website is updated, investors are added, and news from the media is released.

author: Mraksoll
text: Bitweb added to the new block explorer.

author: Mraksoll and Jcchain
text: listing at https://vindax.com/

author: Mraksoll and Jcchain
text: Bitweb listed at coinpaprika and AtomicDEX-beta, The official website is updated again and added them.

author: Mraksoll and Mr.G
text: Update domain from https://bitwebcore.org to https://bitwebcore.net, so all subdomains what was at this domain changed , explorer , webwallets , etc...

author: Mraksoll and Mr.G
text: Update to new social media Accounts/Threads. Twitter , Reddit , Bitcointalk , Trustpilot was updated.
